title: How can technology help teachers in teaching process? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology has become increasingly helpful including: Use of SMART whiteboardsProduction of audio podcasts of lessons for students to revise or catch up with if absent for a classVideo productionsComputer-based instruction. This can also be used to keep one group of students busy while teachers provide specific assistance to slower learnersStudent use of technology eg, learning database, word processing and spreadsheets, desktop publishing, project management and more on laptops/desktopsCommunication via email, messaging media or group chatsSurveys to gauge understandingOnline assessment and evaluation mediaApps that are specifically intended for learningInternet searching aids research and discovery learningI’m sure there is more I could have added.
